mapper.insert: insert into account (id, name, account_number, now_money, remark, flag, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{accountNumber}, #{nowMoney}, #{remark}, #{flag}, #{status});
insert into supplier (name, phone, address, fax, email, account_id, remark, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{accountId}, #{remark}, #{status});
insert into member (id, name, phone, email, discount, status, remark) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{discount}, #{status}, #{remark});
insert into store (name, address, status, remark) VALUES (#{name}, #{address}, #{status}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update account set name = #{name}, account_number = #{accountNumber}, now_money = #{nowMoney}, remark = #{remark}, flag = #{flag} where id = #{id};
update supplier set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, account_id = #{accountId}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id};
update member set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, discount = #{discount}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, name, phone, address, fax, email, account_id, remark from supplier where status = 1 limit #{page}, #{limit};
select id, name, account_number, now_money, remark, flag from account where status = 1 limit #{page},#{limit};

status = 1

select id, name, account_number, now_money, remark, flag from account where name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND status = 1 limit #{page},#{limit};

status = 1

select id, name, address, status, remark from store where status = 1 and id = #{id};
select id, name, account_number, now_money, remark, flag from account where status = 1 and flag = 1 limit #{page},#{limit};
select id, name, account_number, now_money, remark, flag from account where name like CONCAT('%', #{searchParams}, '%') AND status = 1 and flag = 1 limit #{page},#{limit};
